item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251229.2)
item.description:
What's New

Fix macro trigger after spell check restore

  • Macro check now happens AFTER successful spell check restore in processWordBreak
  • Fixed backspaceCount to use transformed text length instead of original keystrokes
  • Ensures macros work correctly when spell check restores invalid words
  • Example: typing 'intẻ' (invalid) → 'inter' (restored) → macro expansion works
